name: FutureU: The Prep Game for SAT
overview: Introducing a painless new way to prep for the SAT. Sharpen your skills and build relevant knowledge with games that feature curriculum from Kaplan, the leader in SAT prep. There's no easier - or more fun - way to become a better problem-solver, boost your confidence and up your SAT score! Features • Improve core knowledge of the test material through fun games. • Track your progress and identify areas that need more practice. • Strengthen test-taking skills that will help you on the SAT, in your college experience and in life
